Label: IQ metadata record identifier
Definition: UUID - IQ metadata record unique identifier

Label: Image file name
Definition: Original image file name

Label: Image metadata id
Definition: UUID - Image metadata record unique identifier
Note: This should be deprecagted and assigned with new unique image id.

Label: User identification number
Definition: User identification number

Label: If the image a fish specimen?
Definition: Whether or not fish are in the image.

Label: How many fishes in the image?
Definition: Number of fish in the image.

Label: Does the image include a ruler?
Definition: Whether or not a ruler in the image.

Label: Does the image include a specimen label?
Definition: Whether or not a label in the image.

Label: Does the number in the image file name, [filename] match the number on the label?
Definition: Whether or not the image name matches the number on the label.

Label: Is a barcode visible in any part of the image?
Definition: Whether or not a barcode in the image.
Whether or not the catalog number is correct.

Label: Is the specimen label detailed (multiple lines of information) or does it have just a specimen number(basic)?
Definition: Whether or not the label is detailed and has full information.

Label: Does the image have a color scale bar?
Definition: Whether or not a color bar is in the image.

Label: Is there a specimen label attached to the fish specimen in the image?
Definition: Whether or not each fish specimen has a label.

Label: Does the image contain any objects other than fish, ruler, specimen label, color bar?
Definition: Identify objects in image that are not fish specimens.

Label: Do any of the objects in the image overlap or hide any part of the fish?
Definition: Whether or not objects in the image overlap or hide any parts of the fish.

Label: One a clock face (click show/hide clock), which direction is the fish's head pointing?
Definition: Number on a clock face the fishâ€™s head is pointing to.

Label: Which surfaces of the specimen are visible in the image(left side visible when head points left)?
Definition: The surface(s) of the specimen visible.
Examples: Left side only (left side visible when head points left)

Label: Is the body of the fish specimen straight or curved?
Definition: Whether or not the body of the fish specimen is curved or straight.

Label: Are any parts of the fish cropped from view?
Definition: Whether or not any parts of the fish are cropped from view.

Label: Are all parts (including fins) of the fish visible?
Definition: Whether or not all parts of the fish (including fins) are visible.

Label: Are any of the fins lying down or folded oddly?
Definition: Whether or not any of the fins are folded.

Label: Rate the brightness of the fish specimen.
Definition: The brightness of the fish specimen.

Label: Is the background of the image uniform?
Definition: Whether or not the background of the image is uniform.

Label: Is the fish specimen in focus?
Definition: Whether or not the fish specimen is in focus.

Label: Does the specimen have any color issues?
Definition: Identify color-related issues with the specimen

Label: Rate overall image quality from 1-10:
Definition: The overall quality of the image.

Label: Scientific Name
Definition: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. This term should not contain identification qualifications, which should instead be supplied in the IdentificationQualifier term.

Label: Genus
Definition: The full scientific name of the genus in which the taxon is classified.

Label: Family
Definition: The full scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified.
